changelog:
Google-ify DeskClock
Add missing GPS blobs
Volume key cursor control
Fixed Captive Portal login
Removed black & white accents
Per-app cellular data and wifi restrictions
Screenshot tile: remove regional screenshot
Fix StatusBar icons tinting when in split screen
Camera: Add feature extensions
Camera: Longshot with Burst Functionality
Camera: Support legacy HALv1 camera in mediaserver
Camera: Allow devices to load custom CameraParameter code
Camera: CameraHardwareInterface changes to support Extended FD
Camera: Add support for preview frame fd
audio: extend unprocessed audio
audio: Support 2 instances of "primary input"
audio: Update microphone characteristics.
audio: Add microphone characteristics and snd device mapping
audio: Hax libaudcal.so to store acdbdata in new path
audio: remove unprocessed-quad-mic
Launcher3: Hide apps menu: save on app check/uncheck
Launcher3: Make hide apps recyclerview smooth
Launcher3: Added reset option to 'hide app' feature
Launcher3: Refactor hidden apps activity
Launcher3: Implement hidden app feature
Launcher3: Swipe down to show notifications panel
Launcher3: Make notifications gesture optional
MTP: Fix crash when no storages are available
QCamera2: HAL3: Add video encoder flags for high speed recording
CarrierConfigManager: Enable enhanced call blocking function
